whats the diff between counter and rebutt
counterargument is basically an argument against your pointrebuttal of counterargument is arguing against the argument arguing against your point

e.g.if you agree that NS is a waste of time  a counterargument would be that NS allows you to learn social skills and grow as a personthe rebuttal would be that you could do all that w/o NS  with the example of singaporean women being raised
